info.title: Connected Admin API
info.description: The Admin API allows you to manage your Connected community programmatically.

tags.name: Accounts
tags.description: The command center for managing client profiles, tracking community data, and monitoring all member interactions

tags.name: Accounts::Addresses
tags.description: Store and manage physical addresses associated with accounts for shipping, billing, or location purposes

tags.name: Accounts::Followers
tags.description: Track and manage accounts who follow a specific account, enabling social connections and activity feed customization

tags.name: Accounts::Following
tags.description: Manage which accounts an account chooses to follow, allowing users to curate their activity feed and stay connected with relevant content

tags.name: Accounts::Groups
tags.description: View and manage group memberships for accounts, showing which groups an account belongs to and enabling group-based permissions

tags.name: Accounts::Interests
tags.description: Associate hashtag-like interests with accounts to categorize content, enable discovery, and personalize the user experience

tags.name: Accounts::Invitations
tags.description: Create an email allowlist that controls who can sign up and join your private community, restricting access to authorized email addresses

tags.name: Accounts::Leads
tags.description: Track and manage lead information associated with accounts for sales and marketing purposes

tags.name: Accounts::Tiers
tags.description: Associate accounts with membership tiers and segments to grant access to exclusive content, pricing, and features

tags.name: Activities
tags.description: Keep your community active with engagement in the Activity Feed

tags.name: Activities::Schedule
tags.description: Schedule activities to be published at specific times, allowing for planned content releases and coordinated community engagement

tags.name: Advertisements
tags.description: Drive revenue, boost sponsor brand visibility, and engage directly with your community using advertisements

tags.name: Announcements
tags.description: Keep your community in the loop with important updates, news, and highlights directly to your audience

tags.name: Announcements::Schedule
tags.description: Schedule announcements to go live at the most impactful times, ensuring important messages reach your audience when they're most likely to see them

tags.name: ApiLogs
tags.description: Operations for viewing API logs

tags.name: AuthSessions
tags.description: Operations for managing authentication sessions

tags.name: Benefits
tags.description: Create and manage exclusive offers or discounts provided to accounts in the community

tags.name: Bookings
tags.description: Attendees can book specific time-slots for event experiences with bookings

tags.name: Bookings::Availabilities
tags.description: Define available time slots for bookable spaces, allowing attendees to reserve specific times for activities like meetings or photo sessions

tags.name: Bookings::Blackouts
tags.description: Set blackout periods when bookings are unavailable, preventing reservations during maintenance, holidays, or other restricted times

tags.name: Bookings::Places
tags.description: Define top-level venues that contain bookable spaces, such as hotels, conference centers, or virtual platforms, providing context for all reservable areas

tags.name: Bookings::Spaces
tags.description: Create specific, individual areas within a larger place that attendees can reserve for time-slots, such as meeting rooms, booths, or photo-op locations

tags.name: Channels
tags.description: Channels combines versatile video hosting with written updates to help you effectively reach, inform, and entertain your community

tags.name: Dashboards
tags.description: Operations for dashboard data

tags.name: Dashboards::Widgets
tags.description: Configure and customize dashboard widgets to display key metrics, KPIs, and visualizations for monitoring community activity and performance

tags.name: EmailReceipts
tags.description: Operations for managing email receipts

tags.name: Events
tags.description: Organize and manage events effortlessly with seamless registration, detailed scheduling, and real-time updates

tags.name: Events::Access
tags.description: Configure access controls for events, determining who can view, register for, or participate in event content and activities

tags.name: Events::Activations
tags.description: Manage on-site check-ins, control access activations for special zones or sessions, and set permissions for scanning devices and staff

tags.name: Events::Addons
tags.description: Offer supplementary items or services like exclusive workshops, networking upgrades, merchandise, or special amenities that enhance the attendee experience

tags.name: Events::Attendees
tags.description: Track accounts that have started or completed registration for an event, monitor registration status, and manage attendee information

tags.name: Events::Attendees::Packages
tags.description: View and manage packages purchased by event attendees, tracking bundled pass combinations and package-specific benefits

tags.name: Events::Attendees::Reservations
tags.description: Manage lodging and accommodation reservations made by event attendees, including room assignments and reservation details

tags.name: Events::Benefits
tags.description: Associate exclusive offers or discounts with events, providing special perks to attendees or members

tags.name: Events::Blocks
tags.description: Operations for events::blocks

tags.name: Events::Bypass
tags.description: Bypass standard registration requirements to grant direct access to events or passes, useful for comps, sponsors, or special circumstances

tags.name: Events::Cohosts
tags.description: Assign co-hosts to events who can help manage and moderate event activities, content, and attendee interactions

tags.name: Events::Coupons
tags.description: Create and manage promotional discount codes that attendees can apply at checkout to reduce pass prices and drive registrations

tags.name: Events::Emails
tags.description: Send and manage event-related email communications to attendees, including confirmations, updates, and promotional messages

tags.name: Events::Faqs
tags.description: Create and manage frequently asked questions for events, providing attendees with answers to common inquiries about registration, logistics, and event details

tags.name: Events::Followups
tags.description: Send follow-up communications to event attendees after the event concludes, including surveys, thank you messages, and next steps

tags.name: Events::Matches
tags.description: Create customizable pairings to group attendees together for activities like golf foursomes, table assignments, or networking sessions

tags.name: Events::Media
tags.description: Upload, organize, and manage media files associated with events, including images, videos, and documents for event pages and content

tags.name: Events::OnSite
tags.description: Configure on-site check-in processes, manage access activations, and set scan permissions to ensure smooth and secure attendee access throughout the event

tags.name: Events::Packages
tags.description: Create bundled pass offerings that combine multiple pass types into a single purchase, often at a discounted rate, simplifying registration for families or groups

tags.name: Events::Packages::Passes
tags.description: Configure which pass types are included in event packages and set quantity limits for each pass type within the package

tags.name: Events::Pages
tags.description: Customize event page content, including descriptions, images, FAQs, sponsor information, and other details that appear on the public event page

tags.name: Events::Passes
tags.description: Manage individual passes purchased by attendees, tracking pass status, check-ins, and access permissions for event registration

tags.name: Events::Passtypes
tags.description: Create and configure pass types with unique names, descriptions, prices, access levels, and rules that define what each pass enables

tags.name: Events::Passtypes::Priceschedules
tags.description: Set dynamic pricing that automatically changes on specific dates, allowing for early bird pricing, regular pricing, and late registration fees

tags.name: Events::Passtypes::Refundschedules
tags.description: Define refund policies that specify how much money attendees receive if they cancel their pass, based on cancellation timing and pass type

tags.name: Events::Questions
tags.description: Create custom registration questions to collect essential attendee information, enabling better event planning and personalized experiences

tags.name: Events::Rooms
tags.description: Manage specific room assignments and room numbers for event accommodations, allowing attendees to select or be assigned particular rooms

tags.name: Events::Roomtypes
tags.description: Define room categories for event accommodations, such as single, double, or suite, with pricing, capacity, and availability settings

tags.name: Events::Sections
tags.description: Organize event content into sections for better navigation and structure, grouping related information or activities together

tags.name: Events::Sessions
tags.description: Create, schedule, and configure individual sessions within your event agenda, including details, speakers, locations, and registration requirements

tags.name: Events::Sessions::Accesses
tags.description: Control who can access specific sessions, setting restrictions based on pass types, capacity limits, or registration requirements

tags.name: Events::Sessions::Locations
tags.description: Define physical venues, rooms, or virtual spaces where sessions occur, providing clear navigational information for attendees

tags.name: Events::Sessions::Matches
tags.description: Create matchmaking pairings for session-specific activities, grouping attendees together for networking or collaborative sessions

tags.name: Events::Sessions::Questions
tags.description: Add custom questions to session registration, collecting additional information from attendees who register for specific sessions

tags.name: Events::Sessions::Sections
tags.description: Organize session content into sections, grouping related sessions or activities for better agenda navigation

tags.name: Events::Speakers
tags.description: Create detailed speaker profiles with biographies, photos, company information, and social media links to showcase event presenters

tags.name: Events::Sponsors
tags.description: Create and display sponsor profiles on the event page, recognizing supporters with logos, descriptions, and website links

tags.name: Events::Sponsorshiplevels
tags.description: Create sponsorship level categories like Platinum, Gold, or Silver to organize sponsors by contribution level and display them accordingly

tags.name: Events::Sponsorships
tags.description: Manage sponsorship relationships and benefits, tracking sponsor contributions and associated perks or visibility

tags.name: Events::Templates
tags.description: Save event configurations as templates to quickly create new events with similar settings, streamlining event setup and ensuring consistency

tags.name: Events::Tracks
tags.description: Categorize sessions into thematic tracks with color coding, helping attendees filter complex schedules and find content aligned with their interests

tags.name: Files
tags.description: Operations for managing files

tags.name: Groups
tags.description: Create and manage dedicated groups within your community to foster collaboration and connection

tags.name: Groups::Events
tags.description: Associate events with groups, allowing group members to discover and register for group-specific events or activities

tags.name: Groups::Interests
tags.description: Tag groups with interests to help members discover relevant groups and enable interest-based filtering and recommendations

tags.name: Groups::Invitations
tags.description: Send direct invitations to specific users to join private groups, tracking invitation status and proactively growing group membership

tags.name: Groups::Members
tags.description: View the complete roster of group members, add or remove members, and adjust roles to maintain a well-organized community

tags.name: Groups::Moderators
tags.description: Assign elevated privileges to trusted group members, enabling them to help moderate content, manage members, and maintain community standards

tags.name: Groups::Requests
tags.description: Review membership requests for private groups, approving or denying access to ensure appropriate membership and maintain group exclusivity

tags.name: Groups::Sponsors
tags.description: Associate sponsors with groups, recognizing supporting organizations or individuals within group contexts

tags.name: Imports
tags.description: Operations for data imports

tags.name: Interests
tags.description: A community-wide tagging system that acts like hashtags and allows users to share trending topics

tags.name: Invoices
tags.description: Streamline your event invoicing and gain complete financial oversight with instant differentiation between paid and outstanding invoices

tags.name: Invoices::Lineitems
tags.description: View and manage individual line items on invoices, tracking specific charges, quantities, and prices for detailed financial records

tags.name: Logins
tags.description: Operations for managing login records

tags.name: Logins::Accounts
tags.description: Link login credentials to accounts, enabling the flexible system where one login can access multiple accounts or one account can be accessed by multiple logins

tags.name: Meetings
tags.description: A scalable solution for virtual events, featuring structured sessions, efficient presets, and integrated recordings for lasting engagement

tags.name: Meetings::Links
tags.description: Generate and manage meeting links for virtual sessions, providing secure access URLs for participants to join meetings

tags.name: Meetings::Livestreams
tags.description: Configure and manage livestream settings for meetings, enabling real-time video broadcasting to larger audiences

tags.name: Meetings::Participants
tags.description: Manage meeting participants, including adding attendees, tracking attendance, and controlling participant permissions

tags.name: Meetings::Presets
tags.description: Create reusable meeting configuration presets to reduce setup time and ensure consistent settings across similar meeting types

tags.name: Meetings::Recordings
tags.description: Access and manage meeting recordings, enabling content curation and sharing value long after meetings conclude

tags.name: Meetings::Sessions
tags.description: Structure complex meetings into multiple sessions, organizing content and activities within a single meeting event

tags.name: Notifications
tags.description: Operations for managing notifications

tags.name: Organization
tags.description: Ensure that your community runs according to your liking by using the Control Center feature for centralized command center adjustments

tags.name: Organization::Attributes
tags.description: Create custom account fields with specific rules to capture essential user data beyond default profile fields, building richer profiles and enabling better segmentation

tags.name: Organization::Domains
tags.description: Configure allowed email domains for organization accounts, controlling who can register and join the community

tags.name: Organization::Integrations
tags.description: Connect third-party software and services to extend platform capabilities, automate workflows, and sync data between systems

tags.name: Organization::Modules
tags.description: Enable or disable platform modules and features, customizing which capabilities are available to your organization

tags.name: Organization::Modules::Custom
tags.description: Configure custom modules and features specific to your organization's needs and requirements

tags.name: Organization::Modules::Settings
tags.description: Operations for organization::modules::settings

tags.name: Organization::Modules::Tiers
tags.description: Set tier-based module access, determining which features are available to different membership levels

tags.name: Organization::Payments
tags.description: Configure payment integrations and settings, including payment processors, tax handling, and transaction management

tags.name: Organization::Sideeffects
tags.description: Configure automated actions that occur when specific events happen, such as granting access or sending notifications based on triggers

tags.name: Organization::Tax
tags.description: Set up tax calculation and collection settings, including tax codes, rates, and integration with tax services like Avalara

tags.name: Organization::Teammembers
tags.description: Manage team members and administrators for the organization, assigning roles and permissions for platform access

tags.name: Organization::Users
tags.description: Manage user accounts and access for the organization, controlling who can use the platform and what permissions they have

tags.name: Organization::Webhooks
tags.description: Configure webhook endpoints to receive real-time notifications about platform events, enabling integration with external systems and automation

tags.name: Payments
tags.description: View a comprehensive record of all past transactions and payment activities

tags.name: Preferences
tags.description: Operations for managing preferences

tags.name: PushDevices
tags.description: Operations for managing push notification devices

tags.name: Reports
tags.description: Easily review and gain data-driven insights for community management

tags.name: Reports::Users
tags.description: Generate detailed reports about user activity, behavior, and engagement to gain insights into community participation and trends

tags.name: Searchlists
tags.description: Operations for managing search lists

tags.name: Searchlists::Values
tags.description: Manage predefined values for search lists used in registration questions and forms, providing dropdown options and controlled input choices

tags.name: Self
tags.description: Operations for the authenticated user

tags.name: Self::Apikeys
tags.description: Generate and manage API keys for the authenticated user, enabling programmatic access to platform features and data

tags.name: Self::Images
tags.description: Upload and manage profile images and photos for the authenticated user's account

tags.name: Series
tags.description: Operations for managing event series

tags.name: Series::Registrations
tags.description: Manage account registrations for event series

tags.name: Sponsors
tags.description: Operations for managing sponsorship levels

tags.name: Sponsors::Accounts
tags.description: Associate accounts with membership levels to grant tier-based access, pricing, and benefits based on membership status

tags.name: Storage::Files
tags.description: Operations for storage::files

tags.name: Storage::Images
tags.description: Operations for storage::images

tags.name: Storage::Videos
tags.description: Operations for storage::videos

tags.name: Storage::Videos::Captions
tags.description: Operations for storage::videos::captions

tags.name: Streams
tags.description: Operations for managing streams

tags.name: Streams::Outputs
tags.description: Configure stream output destinations and settings, controlling where and how video streams are broadcast or recorded

tags.name: Streams::Sessions
tags.description: Manage streaming sessions, including starting, stopping, and monitoring live video streams for events or content delivery

tags.name: Support
tags.description: Monitor and support areas within the community that require attention to ensure consistent care and engagement

tags.name: Support::Messages
tags.description: Send and receive support messages with users, enabling direct communication to resolve issues and provide assistance

tags.name: Support::Notes
tags.description: Add internal notes to support tickets for team collaboration, tracking resolution steps, and maintaining support history

tags.name: Surveys
tags.description: Easily gather insights and feedback by using surveys

tags.name: Surveys::Questions
tags.description: Create and configure survey questions to gather feedback, opinions, and insights from your community

tags.name: Surveys::Sections
tags.description: Organize survey questions into logical sections, improving survey structure and user experience

tags.name: Surveys::Submissions
tags.description: View and analyze survey responses submitted by participants, extracting insights and feedback data

tags.name: Threads
tags.description: A collection of messages around a specific topic for seamless, real-time collaboration

tags.name: Threads::Circles
tags.description: Create circles that bring together sets of accounts around specific goals, teams, or purposes, enabling focused group communication

tags.name: Threads::Circles::Accounts
tags.description: Manage which accounts belong to thread circles, adding or removing members to control circle membership and access

tags.name: Threads::Members
tags.description: Manage thread membership, controlling who can participate in specific thread conversations

tags.name: Threads::Messages
tags.description: Send and manage messages within threads, enabling real-time collaboration and discussion around specific topics

tags.name: Threads::Messages::Files
tags.description: Attach and manage files within thread messages, sharing documents and resources in conversation context

tags.name: Threads::Messages::Images
tags.description: Attach and manage images within thread messages, enabling visual communication and content sharing

tags.name: Threads::Messages::Reactions
tags.description: Add reactions to thread messages, enabling quick feedback and engagement without requiring full replies

tags.name: Threads::Messages::Videos
tags.description: Attach and manage videos within thread messages, sharing video content in conversation threads

tags.name: Tiers
tags.description: Operations for managing membership tiers

ApiKeyAuth.name: api-key
ApiKeyAuth.description: All requests must include an API key.

OrganizationId.name: organization
OrganizationId.description: Most requests must include an organization ID.
